name: Shadow Wizard
description:
Shadow wizard is a tower-defense game, where you fight plenty of dark monsters. From where they are coming, is unknown. As a lone wizard, it is up to you, to find the source and stop them!

Watch on YT: [ Shadow Wizard ]

Features

  • over 50 unique maps, in different biomes
  • 16 enemy units to fight, 12 buildings to destroy
  • build 6 types of towers and 4 essence extractors
  • you will learn 6 helpful spells
  • level up 13 magic skills
  • complete all 20 achievements

System requirements:

CPU: Intel Core i3-3220 or equivalent

GPU: AMD Radeon R7 250 or equivalent

Memory: 2 GB free RAM

Monitor resolution: 1024x768 and higher

Windows 32/64bit (7, 8, 10), Linux 32/64bit (tested on Mint 17.2)
